Description: Serpentine statue of Harwa squatting and offering figures of Isis and Hathor; cartouche of Amenirdis I incised between.
Curator's comments: Published: PM viii, p. 935. W. Seipel, Gott, Mensch, Pharao, Vienna 1992, pp. 388-389 [155]. R. Schulz, Die Entwicklung und Bedeutung des Kuboiden Statuentypus, 34 (1992). [pls.146a,b].
Exhibition history: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2022 27 April – 25 July, Paris, Musée du Louvre, Pharaoh of the Two Lands
